Downloads

To download the files for the exercises there are several options:

  1. Directly from github , go to file, click on raw, select save as. See video here.

  2. In firefox , open link, click on three lines icon , and select save page as (or control+S).

  3. In chrome , open the link, and click on the share icon .

Exercises

  • R script containing exercises from the first part. Click here.

  • Csv file containing penguin data. Click here.
